title: Kedaya Kedakuren Lyrics in Tamil From Kalari Movie
stanzas:
Kedaya Kedakuren
un nenjula thala saaya.
nadaya nadakkuren
ada unake thunaiyaaga

unna naan paarthathum
yeruthu kaaichale
kannula kadhalin
ettukaal paaichale

ada unna nenachaale
manam pandhaa
thullaadhaa

un kaiya pudichaale
uyir innum neelaathaa

Kedaya Kedakuren
un nenjula thala saaya.
nadaya nadakkuren
ada unake thunaiyaaga

pogura pokula
podhaiya yethura
pesura saakkula
kadhala oothura

oodhaanguzhal vachchu
ul nenjula
pudhu urchaagatha 
thunichaaye.

nenjoduthaan oru
kadhal padam
chinna kanjaadaiyil
varanjaaye.

kodai mazhaipole
en kaattil neeye
yendi yaendi 
ena paadaa paduthura

Kedaya Kedakuren
un nenjula thala saaya.
nadaya nadakkuren
ada unake thunaiyaaga

aalillaa veedhiyil
aarvamaai paarkiraai.
noolilaa aasaiyai
vervaiyil korkiraai.

un veettukkum 
ada en veettukum
ulla dhooram inge
kuraiyaathaa.

indru un kannamum
ada en kannamum
chinna muthangalaal
niraiyaathaa

yedho edhirpaarthu
naan odaa thenjene
kaadaa, kaanjaen,
ada mazhaiyaai kudhikkuren.

Kedaya ...

seo.title: Kedaya Kedakuren Lyrics in Tamil From Kalari Movie
seo.description: Get the complete Kedaya Kedakuren Lyrics in Tamil From Kalari Movie from Kalari. Read the lyrics penned by Muthuvijayan and composed by VV Prassanna and sung by V. V. Prasanna. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Muthuvijayan, Kalari, VV Prassanna, V. V. Prasanna, Vaishaali, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
